column2: Best natural light: 07:05 AM to 06:05 PM (11.0 hours total)
Morning ventilation: Open windows 07:05 AM - 11:35 AM before heat builds
Evening ventilation: Re-open windows after 02:35 PM when heat subsides
Peak heat at 12:35 PM (813 W/m²). Close blinds 11:35 AM - 02:35 PM
Morning sun 07:05 AM: Ideal for plants needing gentle light
